sentence.Network_en: There was so much blood it had soaked through my boxer shorts.
sentence.Network_cn: 血流得太多，渗透了我的平脚短裤。

sentence.Network_en: He was wearing a blue silk singlet and boxer shorts.
sentence.Network_cn: 他穿着一件蓝色丝绸背心和平脚短裤。

sentence.Network_en: He moved with the grace of a trained boxer.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的动作带着一种训练有素的拳击手的风采。

entry.def: A boxer is someone who takes part in the sport of boxing.
A boxer is a dog with short hair and a rather flat face.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who fights with his fists for sport
2. a workman employed to pack things into containers
3. a breed of stocky medium-sized short-haired dog with a brindled coat and square-jawed muzzle developed in Germany

auth_sentence.content: Bitch Boxer is a solo show worth seeking out.

sentences.en: The boxer took up a fighting stance.
A hard blow knocked the boxer down.
sentences.cn: 对方猛烈的一拳将这个拳击手击倒在地。

sentences.en: He moved lightly on his toes like a boxer.
sentences.cn: 他像拳击手一样踮着脚轻盈移动。
